name: part_002
file: tmp_【 #大空スバル５周年 】大空スバル５周年記念ライブ ～ 5th Anniversary Live Stellar Symphony ～【ホロライブ⧸大空スバル】 [GEgMPHX6_c8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Oozora Subaru performs a cover of 'Adventure' by YOASOBI for her 5th anniversary live concert.
A brief transition scene with the audience waving penlights in the dark.
Subaru performs 'The Sign is B' with guest appearances by Yuzuki Choco, Himemori Luna, and Shirogane Noel.

subtitles.original: アドベンチャー
subtitles.english: Adventure

subtitles.original: 描き出した
subtitles.english: Sketched out

subtitles.original: 飛び乗ったコースターも
subtitles.english: Even the coaster I jumped on

subtitles.original: お揃いのカチューシャも
subtitles.english: Matching headbands too

subtitles.original: かけがえのない瞬間で溢れてる
subtitles.english: Overflowing with irreplaceable moments

subtitles.original: 待ち時間さえも愛しく思える
subtitles.english: Even the wait feels precious

subtitles.original: 次はどこに行こうか
subtitles.english: Where should we go next?

subtitles.original: 軽やかに歩く
subtitles.english: Walking lightheartedly

subtitles.original: 不思議なほどに気がつけば好きでいる時間
subtitles.english: Curiously, before I knew it, I've loved this time

subtitles.original: 太陽が沈んだ街を飾る
subtitles.english: Decorating the town where the sun has set

subtitles.original: 光が織りなすパレードに
subtitles.english: In the parade woven with lights

subtitles.original: 心奪われ噛み締める
subtitles.english: Heart stolen, I cherish it

subtitles.original: あぁ本当にここに来れてよかったな
subtitles.english: Ah, I'm so glad I could come here

subtitles.original: 待ちに待った今日は特別な日
subtitles.english: Today, the day I've long-awaited, is a special day

subtitles.original: いつも通りから飛び出して
subtitles.english: Jumping out from the ordinary

subtitles.original: ほらシャッターを切っても写せない
subtitles.english: Look, even if you press the shutter, you can't capture

subtitles.original: 思い出がいつでも待っている
subtitles.english: The memories that are always waiting

subtitles.original: 春も夏も秋も冬も
subtitles.english: Spring, summer, autumn, and winter

subtitles.original: この場所で見つけた笑顔が
subtitles.english: The smiles I found in this place

subtitles.original: キラキラといくつも積もっていく
subtitles.english: Keep piling up, sparkling away

subtitles.original: さあ次はいつ会いに行けるかな
subtitles.english: Now, when can I go see you next?

subtitles.original: 限界のない冒険の舞台
subtitles.english: A stage for limitless adventure

subtitles.original: 回る地球儀を目印に
subtitles.english: With the spinning globe as our landmark

subtitles.original: さぁ今会いに行こう 特別な1日に
subtitles.english: Now, let's go see you, on this special day

subtitles.original: あなたのアイドル サインはB
subtitles.english: Your idol, the sign is B!

subtitles.original:
サインはB
作詞・作曲：オーイシマサヨシ
subtitles.english:
The Sign is B
Lyrics/Composition: Masayoshi Oishi

subtitles.original: やっと会えたね嬉しいね
subtitles.english: We finally met, I'm so happy

subtitles.original: 待ち遠しくて足をバタバタしながら
subtitles.english: I was so excited, kicking my legs impatiently

subtitles.original: 今日楽しみで寝れなかったよ
subtitles.english: I couldn't sleep because I was looking forward to today

subtitles.original: 緊張なんかしてる場合じゃない
subtitles.english: This is no time to be nervous

subtitles.original: 1分1秒無駄になんてできない
subtitles.english: Not a single minute or second can be wasted

subtitles.original: さぁ始めましょう 君も君も君もお待たせ
subtitles.english: Now, let's begin! You, and you, and you, sorry to keep you waiting!

subtitles.original: さぁ手を鳴らせ いらっしゃいませ
subtitles.english: Now, clap your hands! Welcome!

subtitles.original: 好きが集まる場所へようこそ
subtitles.english: Welcome to the place where "love" gathers

subtitles.original: 日常はクロークの中
subtitles.english: Leave your daily life in the cloakroom

subtitles.original: ここに来たなら踊らにゃ損 損
subtitles.english: If you've come here, it's a loss if you don't dance!

subtitles.original: 1人だろうが居まいが関係ない
subtitles.english: Whether you're alone or not, it doesn't matter

subtitles.original: 箱が大きい小さいとか気にしない
subtitles.english: I don't care if the venue is big or small

subtitles.original: ちゃんと見えてる 君のペンライト
subtitles.english: I can see it clearly, your penlight

subtitles.original: 今ふっと吹けば飛ぶような
subtitles.english: Right now, like something that would blow away with a puff

subtitles.original: 小さな小さな才能だけど私を推してくれるのなら
subtitles.english: It's a tiny, tiny talent, but if you'll support me

subtitles.original: 爆レスをあげる
subtitles.english: I'll give you a huge response!

subtitles.original: あなたのアイドル サインはB
subtitles.english: Your idol, the sign is B!

subtitles.original: 普段と違う顔見せてよ
subtitles.english: Show me a face different from your usual one

subtitles.original: みんな今日は絶好調 どうだいなりふり構わずに
subtitles.english: Everyone is in top form today! How about it? Without worrying about appearances!

subtitles.original: ヒソヒソ笑われていても関係ない
subtitles.english: Even if they're whispering and laughing, it doesn't matter

subtitles.original: 周りの目とかとか気にしない
subtitles.english: I don't care about the eyes around me

subtitles.original: ずっと強気よ 君のペンライト
subtitles.english: I'm always confident! Your penlight...

subtitles.original: 風で世界が変わった私を阻んで
subtitles.english: The world changed with the wind, obstructing me

subtitles.original: 1人にボッチを感じたとしてもあなたが笑っていてくれたら
subtitles.english: Even if I felt all alone, if you're smiling for me

subtitles.original: 怖いものはないよ
subtitles.english: There's nothing to be afraid of

subtitles.original: 見てよ見てよ 何か始まる 君との物語が
subtitles.english: Look, look! Something is starting! Our story together!

subtitles.original: あぁなんて素晴らしい景色だ
subtitles.english: Ah, what a wonderful sight!

subtitles.original: 1人だろうが居まいが関係ない
subtitles.english: Whether you're alone or not, it doesn't matter

subtitles.original: 箱が大きい小さいとか気にしない
subtitles.english: I don't care if the venue is big or small

subtitles.original: ちゃんと見えてる 君のペンライト
subtitles.english: I can see it clearly, your penlight

subtitles.original: 今ふっと吹けば飛ぶような
subtitles.english: Right now, like something that would blow away with a puff

subtitles.original: 小さな小さな才能だけど私を推してくれるのなら
subtitles.english: It's a tiny, tiny talent, but if you'll support me

subtitles.original: あなたが笑っていてくれたら
subtitles.english: If you're smiling for me...
